ygData.subject: Locked Book
ygData.msgSnippet: A found an NPC wondering around outside of Freeport s south gate. He had a title, Lord. And although I can t remember exactly what his name was, I know he had
ygData.messageBody:
A found an NPC wondering around outside of Freeport's south gate. He had a
title, Lord. And although I can't remember exactly what his name was, I know
he had only a first name any it started with an "L". He didn't respond to my
hails, and I considered him to be an easy kill. So I killed him. As loot, I
got a "Locked Book". I had another player cast Identify on it, and it turns
out to be his spell book. Does anyone know what I can do with this? Is it a
research book? How can I unlock it? Please help.

-Vorteks, 8th level High Elf Magician on the Burtoxxulous server.
